verses.text: And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when \w Ehud|strong="H0164"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, that \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*; the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of whose \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \add was\add* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*, which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Harosheth|strong="H2800"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for he had \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*; and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* he \w mightily|strong="H2394"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H3905"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w*, a \w prophetess|strong="H5031"\w*, the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Lapidoth|strong="H3941"\w*, she \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.

And she \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* under the palm \w tree|strong="H8560"\w* of \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w* between \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w* and \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to her for \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

And she \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abinoam|strong="H0042"\w* out of \w Kedesh-naphtali|strong="H6943"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Hath not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w draw|strong="H4900"\w* toward \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* with thee \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* and of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*?

And I will \w draw|strong="H4900"\w* unto thee to the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kishon|strong="H7028"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*, the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Jabin’s|strong="H2985"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*, with his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and his \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*; and I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* him into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, If thou wilt \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with me, then I will \w go|strong="H1980"\w*: but if thou wilt not \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with me, \add then\add* I will not \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w surely|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with thee: \w notwithstanding|strong="H0657"\w* the \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* that thou \w takest|strong="H1980"\w* shall not be for thine \w honour|strong="H8597"\w*; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*. And \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* to \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w*.

¶ And \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* \w called|strong="H2199"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* and \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* to \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w*; and he went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* at his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*: and \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with him.

Now \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w* the \w Kenite|strong="H7017"\w*, \add which was\add* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hobab|strong="H2246"\w* the father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, had \w severed|strong="H6504"\w* himself from the \w Kenites|strong="H7017"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* unto the \w plain|strong="H0436"\w* of \w Zaanaim|strong="H6815"\w*, which \add is\add* by \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w*.

And they \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* that \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abinoam|strong="H0042"\w* was gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w*.

And \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H2199"\w* all his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \add even\add* \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him, from \w Harosheth|strong="H2800"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* unto the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Kishon|strong="H7028"\w*.\f + \fr 4.13 \ft together: Heb. by cry, or, proclamation\f*

And \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w*, \w Up|strong="H6965"\w*; for this \add is\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: is not the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee? So \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w*, and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w discomfited|strong="H2000"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*, and all \add his\add* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and all \add his\add* \w host|strong="H4264"\w*, with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w*; so that \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* lighted \w down|strong="H3381"\w* off \add his\add* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w*, and fled \w away|strong="H5127"\w* on his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

But \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and after the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*, unto \w Harosheth|strong="H2800"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*: and all the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; \add and\add* there was not a \w man|strong="H0259"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w*.\f + \fr 4.16 \ft a man: Heb. unto one\f*

Howbeit \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* fled \w away|strong="H5127"\w* on his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* to the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of \w Jael|strong="H3278"\w* the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w* the \w Kenite|strong="H7017"\w*: for \add there was\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* between \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w* and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w* the \w Kenite|strong="H7017"\w*.

¶ And \w Jael|strong="H3278"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Turn \w in|strong="H5493"\w*, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, turn \w in|strong="H5493"\w* to me; \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not. And when he had turned \w in|strong="H5493"\w* unto her into the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, she \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* him with a \w mantle|strong="H8063"\w*.\f + \fr 4.18 \ft mantle: or, rug, or, blanket\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, Give me, I pray thee, a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*; for I am \w thirsty|strong="H6770"\w*. And she \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* a \w bottle|strong="H4997"\w* of \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*, and gave him \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*, and \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* him.

Again he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, Stand \w in|strong="H5975"\w* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and it shall be, when any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* doth \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w enquire|strong="H7592"\w* of thee, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Is \w there|strong="H3426"\w* any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w here|strong="H3426"\w*? that thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, No.

Then \w Jael|strong="H3278"\w* \w Heber’s|strong="H2268"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w nail|strong="H3489"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and \w took|strong="H7760"\w* an \w hammer|strong="H4718"\w* in her \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w softly|strong="H3814"\w* unto him, and \w smote|strong="H8628"\w* the \w nail|strong="H3489"\w* into his \w temples|strong="H7541"\w*, and \w fastened|strong="H6795"\w* it into the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: for he was fast \w asleep|strong="H7290"\w* and \w weary|strong="H5774"\w*. So he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 4.21 \ft and took: Heb. and put\f*

And, behold, as \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*, \w Jael|strong="H3278"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and I will \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* thee the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whom thou \w seekest|strong="H1245"\w*. And when he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into her \add tent\add*, behold, \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w lay|strong="H5307"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, and the \w nail|strong="H3489"\w* \add was\add* in his \w temples|strong="H7541"\w*.

So \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w subdued|strong="H3665"\w* on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w prospered|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w prevailed|strong="H7186"\w* against \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, until they had \w destroyed|strong="H3772"\w* \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.\f + \fr 4.24 \ft prospered…: Heb. going went and was hard\f*
